expands.title: What’s your dream job?
expands.content:
Thanks for asking!

Right now my M-F schedule is:

- Ideally you’d have a physical office located in downtown Portland, OR, USA that I could work from three days per week, while working remotely 2 other days.

expands.title: Will you work for equity?
expands.content:
Yes! Happily. And frankly, I find it a little suspicious that most freelancers and consultants *won't* work for equity.

Given that I’m a risk-tolerant guy with ultra low expenses and zero dependents... there are only three reasons why I wouldn't accept equity.

1. I don't believe in your project's mission.
2. I don't believe in your project's ability to make money.
3. I don't believe in you or your team.

In all three of those cases... I should say no to your project. Right?

So, yeah, I'm happy to put ~~my~~ your money where my mouth is. I need to be paid a minimum of $2,500/month in order to live comfortably, but am happy to accept some or all of the remaining payment in the form of equity.
